import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import QuestionService from './QuestionService' export default function Question() { const [questions, setquestions] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getQuestions() }, []) const getQuestions = () => { QuestionService.getQuestions().then((res) => { setquestions(res.data) console.log(res.data); }) } //Rendering return (
{ questions.map(question => <>
Question No. {question.questionId}
{question.question}
{question.option1}
{question.option2}
{question.option3}
{question.option4}
) } {/*
Question No. | 1


*/} {/* */} {/*
HTML stands for.
HighText Machine Language
HyperText and links Markup Language
HyperText Markup Language
None of these
*/}
) }
